function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Weak vector control and surveillance","Impact":"Re-infestation of countries with Ae. aegypti","Mitigation":"Improved vector control and surveillance measures","Technologies":"Insecticides, larvicides, and surveillance systems","People":"Population at risk of yellow fever and dengue fever","Owner":"Health organizations, government agencies"},{"Description":"Inadequate political support for eradication campaigns","Impact":"Resurgence of Ae. aegypti and yellow fever","Mitigation":"Sustained political support for eradication campaigns","Technologies":"Media campaigns, public health advocacy","People":"Political leaders, health authorities","Owner":"Government agencies, international organizations"},{"Description":"Cross-border invasion of Ae. aegypti","Impact":"Spread of mosquito-borne diseases to neighboring countries","Mitigation":"Enhanced border protection, international cooperation on vector control","Technologies":"Border surveillance systems, international coordination mechanisms","People":"Population in neighboring countries","Owner":"Government agencies, international organizations"}]}
